entry.title: 'Full trust': Aberdeen players behind Jim Goodwin's tactics despite criticism of Celtic approach
entry.summary: Aberdeen manager Jim Goodwin has come under fierce criticism for the way he set out his team in the 1-0 defeat by Celtic, with many supporters and pundits saying that he was far too defensive and negative in a 5-3-2 formation designed to counter-attack the rampant Premiership leaders.
